attributes.additional_details:
Opposing the proposals for 'New vision for early years services including children centres'(reforms and closures to children's centres).

I am opposing the governments plans to reform the children's centres.
Plans include
.Offering services only to those deemed as in greater need of support meaning groups are offered on an invitation only basis
.Have fewer centres and make existing centres into super hubs or used to expand nurserys and schools

My Aim is to stop changes because
.They could have a negative impact on comunities
. Leave mothers feeling isolated, unable to afford private groups
. Hinder childrens (under two) social and education developments
